verses.verse: וַֽיְהִ֥י <S%H1961><s%> used כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> now the whole הָאָ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> And the whole earth שָׂפָ֣ה <S%H8193><s%> language אֶחָ֑ת <S%H259><s%> was of one וּדְבָרִ֖ים <S%H1697><s%> speech אֲחָדִֽים׃ <S%H259><s%> and of one

וַֽיְהִ֖י <S%H1961><s%> came בְּנָסְעָ֣ם <S%H5265><s%> And it came to pass as they journeyed מִקֶּ֑דֶם <S%H6924><s%> from the east וַֽיִּמְצְא֥וּ <S%H4672><s%> that they found בִקְעָ֛ה <S%H1237><s%> a plain בְּאֶ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> in the land שִׁנְעָ֖ר <S%H8152><s%> of Shinar וַיֵּ֥שְׁבוּ <S%H3427><s%> and they dwelt שָֽׁם׃ <S%H8033><s%> there

וַיֹּאמְר֞וּ <S%H559><s%> And they said אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> one אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about רֵעֵ֗הוּ <S%H7453><s%> to another הָ֚בָה <S%H3051><s%> Go to נִלְבְּנָ֣ה <S%H3835><s%> let us make לְבֵנִ֔ים <S%H3843><s%> brick וְנִשְׂרְפָ֖ה <S%H8313><s%> and burn לִשְׂרֵפָ֑ה <S%H8316><s%> them throughly וַתְּהִ֨י <S%H1961><s%> had לָהֶ֤ם הַלְּבֵנָה֙ <S%H3843><s%> And they had brick לְאָ֔בֶן <S%H68><s%> for stone וְהַ֣חֵמָ֔ר <S%H2564><s%> and slime הָיָ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> used לָהֶ֖ם לַחֹֽמֶר׃ <S%H2563><s%> they for morter

וַיֹּאמְר֞וּ <S%H559><s%> And they said הָ֣בָה ׀ <S%H3051><s%> Go to נִבְנֶה־ <S%H1129><s%> let us build לָּ֣נוּ עִ֗יר <S%H5892><s%> us a city וּמִגְדָּל֙ <S%H4026><s%> and a tower וְרֹאשׁ֣וֹ <S%H7218><s%> whose top בַשָּׁמַ֔יִם <S%H8064><s%> [may reach] unto heaven וְנַֽעֲשֶׂה־ <S%H6213><s%> and let us make לָּ֖נוּ שֵׁ֑ם <S%H8034><s%> us a name פֶּן־ <S%H6435><s%> otherwise נָפ֖וּץ <S%H6327><s%> lest we be scattered abroad עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over פְּנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> upon the face כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> of the whole הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> of the whole earth

וַיֵּ֣רֶד <S%H3381><s%> came down יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD לִרְאֹ֥ת <S%H7200><s%> to see אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָעִ֖יר <S%H5892><s%> the city וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַמִּגְדָּ֑ל <S%H4026><s%> and the tower אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which בָּנ֖וּ <S%H1129><s%> builded בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> which the children הָאָדָֽם׃ <S%H120><s%> of men

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD הֵ֣ן <S%H2005><s%> Behold עַ֤ם <S%H5971><s%> Behold the people אֶחָד֙ <S%H259><s%> [is] one וְשָׂפָ֤ה <S%H8193><s%> language אַחַת֙ <S%H259><s%> and they have all one לְכֻלָּ֔ם <S%H3605><s%> all וְזֶ֖ה <S%H2088><s%> and this הַחִלָּ֣ם <S%H2490><s%> and this they begin לַעֲשׂ֑וֹת <S%H6213><s%> to do וְעַתָּה֙ <S%H6258><s%> and now לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> not יִבָּצֵ֣ר <S%H1219><s%> will be restrained מֵהֶ֔ם <S%H1992><s%> and they כֹּ֛ל <S%H3605><s%> all אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which יָזְמ֖וּ <S%H2161><s%> from them which they have imagined לַֽעֲשֽׂוֹת׃ <S%H6213><s%> to do

הָ֚בָה <S%H3051><s%> Go to נֵֽרְדָ֔ה <S%H3381><s%> let us go down וְנָבְלָ֥ה <S%H1101><s%> and there confound שָׁ֖ם <S%H8033><s%> and there שְׂפָתָ֑ם <S%H8193><s%> their language אֲשֶׁר֙ <S%H834><s%> that לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> they will not יִשְׁמְע֔וּ <S%H8085><s%> they may not understand אִ֖ישׁ <S%H582><s%> another שְׂפַ֥ת <S%H8193><s%> speech רֵעֵֽהוּ׃ <S%H7453><s%> another's

וַיָּ֨פֶץ <S%H6327><s%> scattered them abroad יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> So the LORD אֹתָ֛ם <S%H853><s%> מִשָּׁ֖ם <S%H8033><s%> from thence עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over פְּנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> upon the face כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> of the whole הָאָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of all the earth וַֽיַּחְדְּל֖וּ <S%H2308><s%> and they left off לִבְנֹ֥ת <S%H1129><s%> to build הָעִֽיר׃ <S%H5892><s%> the city

עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over כֵּ֞ן <S%H3651><s%> after that קָרָ֤א <S%H7121><s%> called שְׁמָהּ֙ <S%H8034><s%> Therefore is the name of it בָּבֶ֔ל <S%H894><s%> Babel כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> because שָׁ֛ם <S%H8033><s%> there בָּלַ֥ל <S%H1101><s%> did there confound יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> because the LORD שְׂפַ֣ת <S%H8193><s%> the language כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> of the whole הָאָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of all the earth וּמִשָּׁם֙ <S%H8033><s%> there הֱפִיצָ֣ם <S%H6327><s%> scatter them abroad יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over פְּנֵ֖י <S%H6440><s%> upon the face כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> of the whole הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> of all the earth פ

אֵ֚לֶּה <S%H428><s%> These תּוֹלְדֹ֣ת <S%H8435><s%> These [are] the generations שֵׁ֔ם <S%H8035><s%> of Shem שֵׁ֚ם <S%H8035><s%> Shem בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> old מְאַ֣ת <S%H3967><s%> [was] an hundred שָׁנָ֔ה <S%H8141><s%> years וַיּ֖וֹלֶד <S%H3205><s%> and begat אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אַרְפַּכְשָׁ֑ד <S%H775><s%> Arphaxad שְׁנָתַ֖יִם <S%H8141><s%> two years אַחַ֥ר <S%H310><s%> after הַמַּבּֽוּל׃ <S%H3999><s%> the flood

וַֽיְחִי־ <S%H2421><s%> lived שֵׁ֗ם <S%H8035><s%> And Shem אַֽחֲרֵי֙ <S%H310><s%> after הוֹלִיד֣וֹ <S%H3205><s%> he begat אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אַרְפַּכְשָׁ֔ד <S%H775><s%> Arphaxad חֲמֵ֥שׁ <S%H2568><s%> five מֵא֖וֹת <S%H3967><s%> hundred שָׁנָ֑ה <S%H8141><s%> years וַיּ֥וֹלֶד <S%H3205><s%> and begat בָּנִ֖ים <S%H1121><s%> sons וּבָנֽוֹת׃ <S%H1323><s%> and daughters ס

וְאַרְפַּכְשַׁ֣ד <S%H775><s%> And Arphaxad חַ֔י <S%H2421><s%> lived חָמֵ֥שׁ <S%H2568><s%> five וּשְׁלֹשִׁ֖ים <S%H7970><s%> and thirty שָׁנָ֑ה <S%H8141><s%> years וַיּ֖וֹלֶד <S%H3205><s%> and begat אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שָֽׁלַח׃ <S%H7974><s%> Salah

וַֽיְחִ֣י <S%H2421><s%> lived אַרְפַּכְשַׁ֗ד <S%H775><s%> And Arphaxad אַֽחֲרֵי֙ <S%H310><s%> after הוֹלִיד֣וֹ <S%H3205><s%> he begat אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שֶׁ֔לַח <S%H7974><s%> Salah שָׁלֹ֣שׁ <S%H7969><s%> and three שָׁנִ֔ים <S%H8141><s%> years וְאַרְבַּ֥ע <S%H702><s%> four מֵא֖וֹת <S%H3967><s%> hundred שָׁנָ֑ה <S%H8141><s%> years וַיּ֥וֹלֶד <S%H3205><s%> and begat בָּנִ֖ים <S%H1121><s%> sons וּבָנֽוֹת׃ <S%H1323><s%> and daughters ס
וְשֶׁ֥לַח <S%H7974><s%> And Salah חַ֖י <S%H2421><s%> lived שְׁלֹשִׁ֣ים <S%H7970><s%> thirty שָׁנָ֑ה <S%H8141><s%> years וַיּ֖וֹלֶד <S%H3205><s%> and begat אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עֵֽבֶר׃ <S%H5677><s%> Eber

וַֽיְחִי־ <S%H2421><s%> lived שֶׁ֗לַח <S%H7974><s%> And Salah אַחֲרֵי֙ <S%H310><s%> after הוֹלִיד֣וֹ <S%H3205><s%> he begat אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עֵ֔בֶר <S%H5677><s%> Eber שָׁלֹ֣שׁ <S%H7969><s%> and three שָׁנִ֔ים <S%H8141><s%> years וְאַרְבַּ֥ע <S%H702><s%> four מֵא֖וֹת <S%H3967><s%> hundred שָׁנָ֑ה <S%H8141><s%> years וַיּ֥וֹלֶד <S%H3205><s%> and begat בָּנִ֖ים <S%H1121><s%> sons וּבָנֽוֹת׃ <S%H1323><s%> and daughters ס

וַֽיְחִי־ <S%H2421><s%> lived עֵ֕בֶר <S%H5677><s%> And Eber אַרְבַּ֥ע <S%H702><s%> four וּשְׁלֹשִׁ֖ים <S%H7970><s%> and thirty שָׁנָ֑ה <S%H8141><s%> years וַיּ֖וֹלֶד <S%H3205><s%> and begat אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> פָּֽלֶג׃ <S%H6389><s%> Peleg

וַֽיְחִי־ <S%H2421><s%> lived עֵ֗בֶר <S%H5677><s%> And Eber אַחֲרֵי֙ <S%H310><s%> after הוֹלִיד֣וֹ <S%H3205><s%> he begat אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> פֶּ֔לֶג <S%H6389><s%> Peleg שְׁלֹשִׁ֣ים <S%H7970><s%> and thirty שָׁנָ֔ה <S%H8141><s%> years וְאַרְבַּ֥ע <S%H702><s%> four מֵא֖וֹת <S%H3967><s%> hundred שָׁנָ֑ה <S%H8141><s%> years וַיּ֥וֹלֶד <S%H3205><s%> and begat בָּנִ֖ים <S%H1121><s%> sons וּבָנֽוֹת׃ <S%H1323><s%> and daughters ס

וַֽיְחִי־ <S%H2421><s%> lived פֶ֖לֶג <S%H6389><s%> And Peleg שְׁלֹשִׁ֣ים <S%H7970><s%> thirty שָׁנָ֑ה <S%H8141><s%> years וַיּ֖וֹלֶד <S%H3205><s%> and begat אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> רְעֽוּ׃ <S%H7466><s%> Reu

וַֽיְחִי־ <S%H2421><s%> lived פֶ֗לֶג <S%H6389><s%> And Peleg אַחֲרֵי֙ <S%H310><s%> after הוֹלִיד֣וֹ <S%H3205><s%> he begat אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> רְע֔וּ <S%H7466><s%> Reu תֵּ֥שַׁע <S%H8672><s%> and nine שָׁנִ֖ים <S%H8141><s%> years וּמָאתַ֣יִם <S%H3967><s%> hundred שָׁנָ֑ה <S%H8141><s%> years וַיּ֥וֹלֶד <S%H3205><s%> and begat בָּנִ֖ים <S%H1121><s%> sons וּבָנֽוֹת׃ <S%H1323><s%> and daughters ס

וַיְחִ֣י <S%H2421><s%> lived רְע֔וּ <S%H7466><s%> And Reu שְׁתַּ֥יִם <S%H8147><s%> two וּשְׁלֹשִׁ֖ים <S%H7970><s%> and thirty שָׁנָ֑ה <S%H8141><s%> years וַיּ֖וֹלֶד <S%H3205><s%> and begat אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שְׂרֽוּג׃ <S%H8286><s%> Serug

וַיְחִ֣י <S%H2421><s%> lived רְע֗וּ <S%H7466><s%> And Reu אַחֲרֵי֙ <S%H310><s%> after הוֹלִיד֣וֹ <S%H3205><s%> he begat אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שְׂר֔וּג <S%H8286><s%> Serug שֶׁ֥בַע <S%H7651><s%> and seven שָׁנִ֖ים <S%H8141><s%> years וּמָאתַ֣יִם <S%H3967><s%> hundred שָׁנָ֑ה <S%H8141><s%> years וַיּ֥וֹלֶד <S%H3205><s%> and begat בָּנִ֖ים <S%H1121><s%> sons וּבָנֽוֹת׃ <S%H1323><s%> and daughters ס

וַיְחִ֥י <S%H2421><s%> lived שְׂר֖וּג <S%H8286><s%> And Serug שְׁלֹשִׁ֣ים <S%H7970><s%> thirty שָׁנָ֑ה <S%H8141><s%> years וַיּ֖וֹלֶד <S%H3205><s%> and begat אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> נָחֽוֹר׃ <S%H5152><s%> Nahor

וַיְחִ֣י <S%H2421><s%> lived שְׂר֗וּג <S%H8286><s%> And Serug אַחֲרֵ֛י <S%H310><s%> after הוֹלִיד֥וֹ <S%H3205><s%> he begat אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> נָח֖וֹר <S%H5152><s%> Nahor מָאתַ֣יִם <S%H3967><s%> two hundred שָׁנָ֑ה <S%H8141><s%> years וַיּ֥וֹלֶד <S%H3205><s%> and begat בָּנִ֖ים <S%H1121><s%> sons וּבָנֽוֹת׃ <S%H1323><s%> and daughters ס

וַיְחִ֣י <S%H2421><s%> lived נָח֔וֹר <S%H5152><s%> And Nahor תֵּ֥שַׁע <S%H8672><s%> nine וְעֶשְׂרִ֖ים <S%H6242><s%> and twenty שָׁנָ֑ה <S%H8141><s%> years וַיּ֖וֹלֶד <S%H3205><s%> and begat אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> תָּֽרַח׃ <S%H8646><s%> Terah

וַיְחִ֣י <S%H2421><s%> lived נָח֗וֹר <S%H5152><s%> And Nahor אַחֲרֵי֙ <S%H310><s%> after הוֹלִיד֣וֹ <S%H3205><s%> he begat אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> תֶּ֔רַח <S%H8646><s%> Terah תְּשַֽׁע־ <S%H8672><s%> nine עֶשְׂרֵ֥ה <S%H6240><s%> teen שָׁנָ֖ה <S%H8141><s%> years וּמְאַ֣ת <S%H3967><s%> hundred שָׁנָ֑ה <S%H8141><s%> years וַיּ֥וֹלֶד <S%H3205><s%> and begat בָּנִ֖ים <S%H1121><s%> sons וּבָנֽוֹת׃ <S%H1323><s%> and daughters ס

וַֽיְחִי־ <S%H2421><s%> lived תֶ֖רַח <S%H8646><s%> And Terah שִׁבְעִ֣ים <S%H7657><s%> seventy שָׁנָ֑ה <S%H8141><s%> years וַיּ֙וֹלֶד֙ <S%H3205><s%> and begat אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אַבְרָ֔ם <S%H87><s%> Abram אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> נָח֖וֹר <S%H5152><s%> Nahor וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָרָֽן׃ <S%H2039><s%> and Haran

וְאֵ֙לֶּה֙ <S%H428><s%> now these תּוֹלְדֹ֣ת <S%H8435><s%> Now these [are] the generations תֶּ֔רַח <S%H8646><s%> of Terah תֶּ֚רַח <S%H8646><s%> Terah הוֹלִ֣יד <S%H3205><s%> begat אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אַבְרָ֔ם <S%H87><s%> Abram אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> נָח֖וֹר <S%H5152><s%> Nahor וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָרָ֑ן <S%H2039><s%> and Haran וְהָרָ֖ן <S%H2039><s%> and Haran הוֹלִ֥יד <S%H3205><s%> begat אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> לֽוֹט׃ <S%H3876><s%> Lot

וַיָּ֣מָת <S%H4191><s%> died הָרָ֔ן <S%H2039><s%> And Haran עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> in פְּנֵ֖י <S%H6440><s%> before תֶּ֣רַח <S%H8646><s%> Terah אָבִ֑יו <S%H1><s%> his father בְּאֶ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> in the land מוֹלַדְתּ֖וֹ <S%H4138><s%> of his nativity בְּא֥וּר <S%H218><s%> in Ur כַּשְׂדִּֽים׃ <S%H3778><s%> of the Chaldees
